org.apache.spark.streaming

Class NetworkReceiverSuite.FakeReceiverSupervisor

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.streaming.receiver.ReceiverSupervisor
      • org.apache.spark.streaming.NetworkReceiverSuite.FakeReceiverSupervisor
  • Enclosing class:
    NetworkReceiverSuite

    public class NetworkReceiverSuite.FakeReceiverSupervisor
extends org.apache.spark.streaming.receiver.ReceiverSupervisor
    An implementation of NetworkReceiverExecutor used for testing a NetworkReceiver. Instead of storing the data in the BlockManager, it stores all the data in a local buffer that can used for verifying that the data has been forwarded correctly.
